pkgmetadata.longdescription: This is the core library of the Gtk2Hs suite of libraries for Haskell based on Gtk+. Gtk+ is an extensive and mature multi-platform toolkit for creating graphical user interfaces.

use.flag: Depend on GIO package, thereby enabling certain features.

Set the default file translation mode for file I/O operations to _O_BINARY. Some GTK libraries open image files without specifing binary mode. If you have trouble loading gtk in ghci, then it may help to turn this option off.
